title: YellowSwap
author: YellowSwap
content: Which algorithm is the best for RX vega 56 right now and do you think its still worth running a rig with RX vega 56? I see that this graphic card is a but profitable with Super Zero coin because of power consumption (141watts) and on ethereum it takes 165watts.

comments.author: rdluffy
comments.body: Ethereum with Ethash's still the most profitable algo to mine with, but only one more month to mine ETH.If you already have a rig of Vega cards, it's worth to turn on and mine until POS.Another alternative is Autolykos (ERGO), profitable too.I'll give a suggestion to help you, install Nicehash app and let run all the benchmarks to help you know which algo is profitable at the moment.Possibly you can find another coins to mine, but both above are more stable to mine and sell in profit.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: YellowSwap on August 18, 2022, 03:27:54 PMWhich algorithm is the best for RX vega 56 right now and do you think its still worth running a rig with RX vega 56? I see that this graphic card is a but profitable with Super Zero coin because of power consumption (141watts) and on ethereum it takes 165watts.With the right setup of the card they can do pretty well in Ethereum mining and once this finishes as many expect in September you can continue with that card to mine Ethereum Classic or any other related coin.For mining that is a good card and if you already have some of them it is not a good choice to keep them turned off because they can make good money in the long run.You can also mine other coins with this card.It remains one of the best old cards for mining,however if you are planning to buy these,do so only if you find them cheap enough,otherwise it is better to start a rig with newer generation of cards like Rtx 3060 or Rtx 3060 ti which lately are down in price.

comments.author: BitKongy
comments.body: The best coins on rx vega 57 and 64 are Ethereum and Ergo and few times my calculator shows that Ergo is more profitable, some times even Super Zero is better than Ethereum, if you have rx vega cards you don't have to worry what happens to Ethereum because you will continue to mine and make same reward from SZ and Ergo.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: YellowSwap on August 18, 2022, 03:27:54 PMWhich algorithm is the best for RX vega 56 right now and do you think its still worth running a rig with RX vega 56? I see that this graphic card is a but profitable with Super Zero coin because of power consumption (141watts) and on ethereum it takes 165watts.Ethash (Ethereum) and Autolykos (Ergo) are the lowest consumption algorithms for mining on RX vega 56. KawPow (Ravencoin) greatly increases energy consumption and heat.You can not buy these video cards now, and if you have a mining farm, then use the calculator and enter your electricity price.https://whattomine.com/gpus/28-amd-radeon-rx-vega-56?cost=0.1&cost_currency=USD

comments.author: S3300
comments.body: Ergo is the best coin to mine on RX vega 56 and 64, power consumption is low and mining reward is a bit higher than Ethereum, on some days Ethereum tend to be more profitable and that's why I like using Nicehash since it can automatically change to the most profitable algo.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: That is a great card to mine with. Personally, I think the way to do it is to mine Ethereum with it on NiceHash and get paid in Bitcoin. That way you’re basically mining BTC with a GPU. You also get to avoid all the hassles that come with mining ETH directly, which for impatient folks can be a lot to deal with.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on August 30, 2022, 10:36:41 PMThat is a great card to mine with. Personally, I think the way to do it is to mine Ethereum with it on NiceHash and get paid in Bitcoin. That way you’re basically mining BTC with a GPU. You also get to avoid all the hassles that come with mining ETH directly, which for impatient folks can be a lot to deal with. Ethereum can rise in price many times more than bitcoin. Nicehash has a high payout threshold for a small number of video cards. Ethereum can be received in the Polygon blockchain on some pools with a minimum commission and a minimum payout threshold.

comments.author: 5W-KILO
comments.body: Are Vega cards still available in the market today? I can't even find one in China right now, they have been sold out both new and used, only a old time miner can sell you a rc vega 56 right now, if I knew that they cards are good for Autolykos algo I wouldn't have sold mine.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: 5W-KILO on August 31, 2022, 03:51:40 PMAre Vega cards still available in the market today? I can't even find one in China right now, they have been sold out both new and used, only a old time miner can sell you a rc vega 56 right now, if I knew that they cards are good for Autolykos algo I wouldn't have sold mine.These graphics cards will sell, but I haven't seen many for sale. Over the past 5 years, many video cards have broken down, some have problems with overclocking. Therefore, for a beginner in about a month, there will be many other cheap alternatives on the market to buy.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: FP91G on September 01, 2022, 12:56:01 PMQuote from: 5W-KILO on August 31, 2022, 03:51:40 PMAre Vega cards still available in the market today? I can't even find one in China right now, they have been sold out both new and used, only a old time miner can sell you a rc vega 56 right now, if I knew that they cards are good for Autolykos algo I wouldn't have sold mine.These graphics cards will sell, but I haven't seen many for sale. Over the past 5 years, many video cards have broken down, some have problems with overclocking. Therefore, for a beginner in about a month, there will be many other cheap alternatives on the market to buy.I can't wait to buy cards again for 60-80 USD for the Rx 570,I will buy them at such price and even mine at a loss because of energy consumption,I will do so because I am extremely confident in a huge rebound of cryptos now that almost everyone does not expect such thing to happen.I would suggest you do the same wait for at least 3 other weeks and build a rig with the cheapest possible cost,do so early as price of cards may rebound as soon as we see crypto prices going up again.It is going to be one hell of a September,why not that of 2017 which brought the first all time high for us in December but the price increase started in that September.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on September 01, 2022, 02:12:50 PMQuote from: FP91G on September 01, 2022, 12:56:01 PMQuote from: 5W-KILO on August 31, 2022, 03:51:40 PMAre Vega cards still available in the market today? I can't even find one in China right now, they have been sold out both new and used, only a old time miner can sell you a rc vega 56 right now, if I knew that they cards are good for Autolykos algo I wouldn't have sold mine.These graphics cards will sell, but I haven't seen many for sale. Over the past 5 years, many video cards have broken down, some have problems with overclocking. Therefore, for a beginner in about a month, there will be many other cheap alternatives on the market to buy.I can't wait to buy cards again for 60-80 USD for the Rx 570,I will buy them at such price and even mine at a loss because of energy consumption,I will do so because I am extremely confident in a huge rebound of cryptos now that almost everyone does not expect such thing to happen.I would suggest you do the same wait for at least 3 other weeks and build a rig with the cheapest possible cost,do so early as price of cards may rebound as soon as we see crypto prices going up again.It is going to be one hell of a September,why not that of 2017 which brought the first all time high for us in December but the price increase started in that September.For 60-70 dollars you will buy video cards with non-working copper tubes of the cooling system and fans that need to be replaced. Broken fans are not so bad and can be easily replaced with cheap 80x80 fans from the store.But these graphics cards have problems with copper tubes when gas comes out. Such video cards work for me at a temperature of 90 degrees in the summer. In winter, the situation is better, but I don’t want to buy this anymore.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: FP91G on September 02, 2022, 10:53:08 AMQuote from: swogerino on September 01, 2022, 02:12:50 PMQuote from: FP91G on September 01, 2022, 12:56:01 PMQuote from: 5W-KILO on August 31, 2022, 03:51:40 PMAre Vega cards still available in the market today? I can't even find one in China right now, they have been sold out both new and used, only a old time miner can sell you a rc vega 56 right now, if I knew that they cards are good for Autolykos algo I wouldn't have sold mine.These graphics cards will sell, but I haven't seen many for sale. Over the past 5 years, many video cards have broken down, some have problems with overclocking. Therefore, for a beginner in about a month, there will be many other cheap alternatives on the market to buy.I can't wait to buy cards again for 60-80 USD for the Rx 570,I will buy them at such price and even mine at a loss because of energy consumption,I will do so because I am extremely confident in a huge rebound of cryptos now that almost everyone does not expect such thing to happen.I would suggest you do the same wait for at least 3 other weeks and build a rig with the cheapest possible cost,do so early as price of cards may rebound as soon as we see crypto prices going up again.It is going to be one hell of a September,why not that of 2017 which brought the first all time high for us in December but the price increase started in that September.For 60-70 dollars you will buy video cards with non-working copper tubes of the cooling system and fans that need to be replaced. Broken fans are not so bad and can be easily replaced with cheap 80x80 fans from the store.But these graphics cards have problems with copper tubes when gas comes out. Such video cards work for me at a temperature of 90 degrees in the summer. In winter, the situation is better, but I don’t want to buy this anymore.I am talking about cards that work normally and are in general overall good condition as I have even bought before like these.The temperatures is true they go near the 90 in summer but I have put a stop mining at 89 degree,right now I have an old rig with 2 such cards that are doing me about 52 Mhsh in the unmineable website mining Litecoin and the temperature of those is 67 degree while the outside temperature is 21-32 degree mostly in the upper numbers because summer is still here.
